title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.55 - Knockout
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 211.55 - Knockout

State Regulations

If the contestant taking the count is still down when the
referee calls the count of ten, or, if in the opinion of the referee, the
contestant who was knocked down is in no condition to continue, the referee
shall wave both arms to indicate a knockout. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
